name: visual-requirements-whiteboard
description: A visual whiteboard for mapping project requirements with connected nodes

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server run build
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install
scripts.mcp:status: docker ps | grep frontend-mcp-server || echo "MCP server not running"
